short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code for YouTube video share links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify sharing on YouTube with YouTube QRCode Share! This Chrome extension adds a new sharing trick to your YouTube toolkit. Just click the share button on any video, and voila! A QR code pops up alongside the regular sharing options. Now, sharing videos is as easy as scanning a QR code.

Quick QR Generation: Instantly generate a QR code when you click the share button on a YouTube video.

Time Stamps Made Easy: Easily share specific moments by toggling the "start at" checkbox – the QR code updates to support both regular and timestamped video links.

Perfect for On-the-Go: Especially handy for when you're switching from desktop to mobile – seamlessly continue watching where you left off by scanning the QR code on your mobile device.
